GSD.description:
gcc-plugins/stackleak: Use noinstr in favor of notrace

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.25 by commit effdcc25058484aaf64b1557efb124c87a733045. For more details please see the references link.
